mapper.insert: insert into member (member_account_id, display_name, email) values (#{id}, #{displayName}, #{email})
mapper.select: select member_id, member_account_id, display_name, email from member where display_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
select member.member_id, member_account_id, display_name, email from member where member.member_id in ( select follower_id from friend where member_id = #{memberId});
select member.member_id, member_account_id, display_name, email from member where member.member_id in ( select member_id from friend where follower_id = #{followerId});
